General.Name: Wuhan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co Ltd
General.Description: WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd provides Beidou applications, smart traffic management, smart transportation, and smart city applications in China. The company offers vehicle intelligent terminal series products, vehicle online monitoring system, and application service of vehicle online monitoring system; and public security traffic control cloud whistle integrated combat platform, public security traffic management video private network integrated command platform, expressway intelligent traffic prevention and control platform, and urban traffic safety monitoring management and control service platform. It also provides smart delivery solutions, including traffic integrated information management system, smart highway management service platform, rural road information management system, water transportation information platform, comprehensive highway control system, and transportation enterprise safety production cloud supervision platform; and smart city solutions, such as Internet of things basic platform, smart parking, smart park operation service platform, IoT terminal products, urban internet of things electric bicycle management and control platform, and risk management and control system for dangerous goods in chemical and logistics parks. WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.
